divs: sighting detailson 14\08\2012 i was enjoying london panorama from my balcony. suddenly i saw 2 razor sharp clouds looking like perfect pyramids. i ran in to my room and grabbed my camera. by the time i set up my camera, those 2 clouds gradually changed its shape and beguine to look like the rest of the cloud (bubbly like). took me a minute or so to observe them while filming, and i was about to switch off my camera. suddenly i saw strange object (ufo) jumped out from behind one of the clouds, which previously looked like a pyramid. i beguine to follow this object which flew from south to the north.
